thread.title: Calvin Harris threatens to sue over salacious Taylor Swift split rumours - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Calvin Harris threatens to sue over salacious Taylor Swift split rumours - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Amy Davidson
title: Calvin Harris threatens to sue over salacious Taylor Swift split rumours - Showbiz
text: Calvin Harris is threatening to sue after rumours about him and his girlfriend Taylor Swift reached new levels of bizarre this week.The Scottish DJ was reported to have paid a dubious visit to a Thai massage parlour by Radar Online, which it claimed prompted Taylor to call time on their relationship. © Josiah Kamau/BuzzFoto via Getty Images Calvin has now bitten back, threatening legal action."It's not going to be a 'happy ending' for everyone I sue for defamation of character for all these bullshit stories bye bye," he tweeted.It's not going to be a 'happy ending' for everyone I sue for defamation of character for all these bullshit stories bye bye— Calvin Harris (@CalvinHarris) October 12, 2015Taylor's publicist also seems to have rubbished rumours, writing: "I've said it before and I'm saying it again, do not believe Radar Online."Meanwhile the singer's friend and star of her 'Bad Blood' music video Selena Gomez has branded the gossip "stupid" and added: "I think I would have found that out."It seems Talvin fans can breathe a sigh of relief.
